messages.messageBody:
I love it!!!! and its in mp3 format so people have those fancy
player things can listen to it over and over again...I guess that
some jpop group will remix it :P
SK knows...well we can *guess* 50s to early 60s (this more based on
my knowledge of Thai folk music---same style)...and a guy is sang it
^_^

wrote:
> Sorry, this has probably been mentioned some place and I'm just
not remembering... Do we know how old "Aa Shinsengumi" is... when

nightclub type musicals, which I know became popular in the 1920's
in Japan. Fascinating song... I really like it.

messages.subject: Shinsengumi song
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry, this has probably been mentioned some place and I m just not remembering...  Do we know how old Aa Shinsengumi is... when it was composed... the
messages.messageBody:
Sorry, this has probably been mentioned some place and I'm just not remembering... Do we know how old "Aa Shinsengumi" is... when it was composed... the recording date? It reminds me of the old nightclub type musicals, which I know became popular in the 1920's in Japan. Fascinating song... I really like it.

phil
